org.apache.tephra.snapshot

Class SnapshotCodecProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tephra.snapshot.SnapshotCodecProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SnapshotCodec

    public class SnapshotCodecProvider
extends Object
implements SnapshotCodec
    Maintains the codecs for all known versions of the transaction snapshot encoding.
